name: Ideogram Drills (for remote viewers)
description:
This is a simple "Ideogram" drill for remote viewers in the 'ideograms should be drilled' group. The prompts are biological-organic, manmade, water, land, space-air, motion-energy, and natural. Once the Start button is pressed, one pseudo-random choice comes up every two and a half seconds.

Because it's just a pseudo-randomized deck of digital cards, you could also use this for practicing microPK and precognition.

Now I've figured out a nice, easy way to code this -- and knowing that not everyone who approaches ideograms this way uses the same bunch -- I'll probably do other sets.

Voice files by Enjaku

Software:
Coding: ct.js
Art: Affinity Designer
Sound Recording: "Reaper"
